TopicTitle: KSP RSSRO Solid rocket Boosters Thrust Curves.

Articles.Content: I was wondering anyone could point me (and potentially anyone else that may be interested) toward information regarding configuring thrust curves for SRB's I cant find anything written or any video content on it. I have a vague, general understanding of what it is and how it kind of works, but i need additional information in order to really fine tune SRB's to how I would like them to run. Anything will help, thanks.
